system.description:
Racial Traits

  • Mountain Goblins can select Karkarash Proper, Karkarash Technical, or Karkarash Gutter as their native language.

Racial Traits (Active Effect)

  • Mountain goblins have a base Combat Point score of 16.
  • Mountain goblins CHP formula is CON Score.

Physical Description

A healthy mountain goblin typically stands between 4½-5’, and weighs between 70-120 lbs. The males are slightly larger than the females. Goblin skin tone ranges in the grays, browns, and greens, and their hair ranges from dark brown to black, usually in a coarse, curly texture. The average goblin lifespan is 75 years, reaching physical adulthood between the ages of 14-19.

Language

The native language of a mountain goblin is Karkarash Technical, though many of them also speak Karkarash Proper or Karkarash Gutter.

Names

Mountain goblins generally have a single name, that spells out their personal name, their family name, and a much wider area called their mountain name, signifying what mountain or mountain region they hail from.
